attributes.action: to help small shops by reducing commercail shop rates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Small independent shops are being slowly squeezed to a point that most are closing up. The commercial rating for small shops is far to high and will cause the closure of high streets where there any independent retailers.
Large conglomerates can open in huge shopping malls, such as the new Westfield in west London, however small independent shops cannot afford these high rents.
In Portobello Rd,Tesco's pay less rates per m2 than all the other shops in the road. This is unfair and puts everyone else at a disadvantage.
